author: Universal Pictures
description:
Gareth Peirce (Emma Thompson) uncovers the truth. 

Buy/Rent In the Name of the Father!
Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/search?phrase=In+the+Name+of+the+Father&k=In+the+Name+of+the+Father&ref=atv_rs_redirect
Apple TV: https://tv.apple.com/us/movie/in-the-name-of-the-father/umc.cmc.27ahnmqrtuxqxc2l47lpnflzw?at=10lbQP&mt=6&ct=uphewebsite
Microsoft: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/search/shop/movies?q=In%20the%20Name%20of%20the%20Father
Universal Pictures Home Entertainment: https://www.uphe.com/movies/in-the-name-of-the-father

An Irish man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. Meanwhile, a British lawyer fights to clear their names and free them.

© 1993 Universal Studios. All Rights Reserved.
Cast: Daniel Day-Lewis, Pete Postlethwaite, Alison Crosbie
Produced by: Jim Sheridan
Directed by: Jim Sheridan 

#InTheNameOfTheFather #EmmaThompson #DanielDayLewis #UniversalPictures
title: Emma Thompson's Stand📜 #IntheNameoftheFather #Shorts

author: Universal Pictures
description:
How To Train Your Dragon - In Theaters June 13

From three-time Oscar® nominee and Golden Globe winner Dean DeBlois, the creative visionary behind DreamWorks Animation’s acclaimed How to Train Your Dragon trilogy, comes a stunning live-action reimagining of the film that launched the beloved franchise. 

On the rugged isle of Berk, where Vikings and dragons have been bitter enemies for generations, Hiccup (Mason Thames; The Black Phone, For All Mankind) stands apart. The inventive yet overlooked son of Chief Stoick the Vast (Gerard Butler, reprising his voice role from the animated franchise), Hiccup defies centuries of tradition when he befriends Toothless, a feared Night Fury dragon. Their unlikely bond reveals the true nature of dragons, challenging the very foundations of Viking society. 

With the fierce and ambitious Astrid (BAFTA nominee Nico Parker; Dumbo, The Last of Us) and the village’s quirky blacksmith Gobber (Nick Frost; Snow White and the Huntsman, Shaun of the Dead) by
title: How To Train Your Dragon - Head Touch Challenge
